titleStmt.title: The triumph of love over fortune a pleasant novel / written in French by that great wit of France, M. St. Bremond ; and translated into English by a person of quality.
Triomphe de l'amour sur le destin. English
titleStmt.author: Brémond, Gabriel de.
Person of quality.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Triomphe de l'amour sur le destin.
First ed. in English. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Some pages are stained, signature A is missing, p. 30-35, 50, and 53 have faded print in filmed copy. Beginning-p. 25 and 30-55 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
